{"games":[{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1289356,"totalDownVotes":57358,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[🛸 ALIENS!] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":276645,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEXT CODE AT 1.3MM LIKES! ❤️💙
Use code "yaydiamonds2" for 50k Diamonds! (Thanks for 1.2MM 💖!)

Pet Simulator X is the latest and greatest game in the Pet Simulator Series with tons of new features and pets!

💰 Collect coins to buy eggs!
🥚 Hatch legendary pets like a Dragon or Unicorn!
🗺️ Unlock and explore new areas & worlds like floating islands!
🔄 Collect and trade pets with other players to become the best!
✨ Upgrade pets or fuse them together!

🎁 Latest Update [11/13/21] -
- 👽 Alien Pets!
- 🧪 Alien Lab!
- 🛸 Alien Forest!
- 🥚 3 New Eggs!
- ✨ 2 New Mythicals!
- 🔥 Huge Pegasus Pets!
- 💰 Giant Alien Chest!

- 📝 Interface Upgrades!
- ⚙️ Auto Delete Additions!
- ⚖️ Balancing!
- 🎃 Halloween Event Over!
+ MORE!

💡 Join the BIG Games groups for a FREE pet!

🧡 Made with love by Preston


🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"go play eclipsis","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1185335,"totalDownVotes":80043,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[💀UPDATE 16] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":187106,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💀 UPDATE 16 /  UPDATE OUT NOW
2 new Fruits, new island, new weapon, new secrets!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2100
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Venom, Control, Dragon, and REVIVE + SHADOW!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":619002,"totalDownVotes":41611,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[💰 x2 Yen] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":93171,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!

","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5076209,"totalDownVotes":980281,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":219482,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎤 Sing 2 x Adopt Me! 🎤

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":659192,"totalDownVotes":141702,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars 🚀 [INFECTED + GUIDED MISSILE!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":103082,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"NEW KIT: 🏹 Vanessa!
Super charge your bow to perform a triple shot.

🔊 Voice Chat Queue
Only players with voice chat enabled are able to join. Have fun while this lasts!

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open Inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera
[T]: Use Spray

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a game
🛌 Protect your base. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2401725,"totalDownVotes":317072,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":100384,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❄️11:18: Pre-Winter Update out now in new servers! Read the update log for more info♡

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":830024,"totalDownVotes":63122,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[🌟UPDATE!⛅] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":76938,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

⬆️Upgrade your Troops During battle to unlock new attacks
⛩️Summon from the Gate and unlock New Units to use them in battles

🕒New things appear in the Summon Gate and Emote Shop every hour

🔨Contributions: Markosumisu, SwiftMerkz01, Rinanori, zakblak20, Iumu ","genre":""},{"creatorId":3229308,"creatorName":"Grand Quest Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":367191,"totalDownVotes":19634,"universeId":648454481,"name":"[2X LOGIA 🎃UPDATE 4.5] Grand Piece Online","placeId":1730877806,"playerCount":32941,"imageToken":"T_1730877806_428d","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":200,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"PC ONLY
Long awaited naval adventure experience. 

Work towards your ideal build, discover hidden locations, and challenge difficult bosses while competing with others!

Scavenge the lands for treasure and exotic fruits known to empower their eaters. Hunt the pirates, or side with them. 

Perhaps you'll join a crew, or better yet, make one yourself. 

2x logia rates are AUTOMATICALLY applied every friday-sunday

Miscellaneous controls:
M-Menu
Ctrl-Climb
P-Sit on ship
WW-Sprint","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4651239,"totalDownVotes":392995,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":64557,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 
 
Twitter: @NikilisRBX
YouTube: Nikilis 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 

Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":689175,"totalDownVotes":76093,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":28326,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.896』 🏹✨

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4677996,"totalDownVotes":632228,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":28527,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thanks for participating in our NASCAR Event in Jailbreak! It was a blast!

The Official NASCAR x Jailbreak Event is HERE! 
🏎 FREE NASCAR Vehicle in the City! (Off-sale!)
🏁 RACETRACK with lap counter and timer! (Gone for now!)
🚗 100k NASCAR with more power! (Off-sale!)

💵 New Bank Floor: The Basement! 
🎮 Fresh and ALL NEW mobile controls! 
💰 You can now drop your museum bags! 
The NASCAR event runs through November 14th! All items stay with you forever! Have fun!

🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":6639766,"creatorName":"Century Makers","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":513308,"totalDownVotes":51607,"universeId":2549475383,"name":"Livetopia🏁 Car Topia !","placeId":6737970321,"playerCount":89909,"imageToken":"T_6737970321_b832","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"One Billion Visits Giveaway -> https://twitter.com/LivetopiaGame

👍 550k likes to unlock the Stars & Love Outfit!","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1799531,"totalDownVotes":143327,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":34919,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for free Honey, Treats and Codes!: https://www.roblox.com/My/Groups.aspx?gid=3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2478054,"totalDownVotes":346589,"universeId":140239261,"name":"💙 MeepCity 💙","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":65346,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! Chat, play games, earn coins, and customize your very own estate! Play with millions of players who play MeepCity! 💙💙 

✨ We're working on more updates!

🔔Click the Follow button for update notifications! And join our Roblox group/community!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":500735,"totalDownVotes":244722,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":23743,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2719022,"totalDownVotes":811470,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":55345,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":3642592,"creatorName":"Schwifty Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1467196,"totalDownVotes":301028,"universeId":498490399,"name":"🌎 Mad City","placeId":1224212277,"playerCount":21547,"imageToken":"T_1224212277_2d87","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🌎🌎🌎
Spatial Chat Added 🔊

Welcome to Mad City, where the choice is yours to choose the power of good or evil. Cause chaos in the city streets as a criminal and super villain or join the super heroes and police force to bring justice to the city. With so many heists, the chaos never stops!

We've added some new weapon commands for you to play with in Mad City Private Servers, enjoy!
admingun
seekergun
sheriffdeagle
bowarrow
infectedknife
repulsor
ninjastar

Follow the developers on twitter for updates and special codes:
Lead Developer: @Taymastar 
Lead Programmer: @ChiefDaysRBLX @osedaycan
World Builder: @FamedChris & @TheGemini_II
3D Modeler: @Nic10Telf
Official Twitter: @SchwiftyStudios

Special thanks to these awesome people: 
@rightIess @kiouhei @Mockerii @Ep1cDrew @PixelatedCandy @TacticalFrosty @DevFoxby @ItsAmmon @PerhapzRBLX @FoxOfJulyy","genre":""},{"creatorId":6556072,"creatorName":"Universe Time Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":471998,"totalDownVotes":77963,"universeId":1782832995,"name":"A Universal Time","placeId":5130598377,"playerCount":12175,"imageToken":"T_5130598377_12c","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"❗ Welcome to A Universal Time ❗
🔮A Universal Time (AUT) is an action/adventure game inspired by many different popular shows, games, and animes. Most notably the Shōnen Jump Anthology's 'JoJo's Bizarre Adventure'.

📰 Current news:
- RANKED SEASON 2.
- NEW GAMEMODE
- ADDED BROLY
- NEW 1V1S MAP
- NEW AURAS
- NEW EMOTES
- NEW DASH ANIMATION, VISUAL CHANGES, ETC
- A LOT OF FIXES AND BALANCES

🔊Sounds are sourced from a majority of open libraries and our sound designers. These can be removed upon legitimate request.🔊","genre":""},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1990994,"totalDownVotes":156947,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces: Pacific Cold Front Pt.1","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":9943,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

[Update 5.5.1]
Map pool returned to normal non-holiday themed states
Added helmets for player models (no influence on bullet hitboxes)
